problem.markdown:
>>Which combination of four functions can you use to calculate last year’s market share? (NOTE: all five of these are actual functions)<<
[x] CALCULATE() [ ] COUNT() [x] SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR() [x] ALL() [x] DIVIDE()
[explanation] You can calculate last year's share using the combination of CALCULATE(), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(), DIVIDE(), and ALL() functions. [explanation]
problem.p: Which combination of four functions can you use to calculate last year’s market share? (NOTE: all five of these are actual functions)

checkboxgroup.label: Which combination of four functions can you use to calculate last year’s market share? (NOTE: all five of these are actual functions)

div.p: You can calculate last year's share using the combination of CALCULATE(), SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(), DIVIDE(), and ALL() functions.
